name: Ministry Search Engine
tagline: This is the refactored Java version of the ministry seach engine
body:
### Hello!
If you are looking to download a working copy of the Ministry Search Engine then visit [this folder on Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ur8mcv115eo3oh8/AADxpoJ9N5CEFxDRxfCtV75ea?dl=0) (email me if you need help).
If you wish to look at or contribute to the code then please continue!

### Things to be aware of
The resources are not included in the Github project you will need to download or generate them separately.

You can generate the resources using the [File Prepare](https://github.com/0mpurdy/MSE-FilePrep) project and the [Resource seed](https://github.com/0mpurdy/MSE-Res-Lite). (More instructions on the File Prepare README)

The default location for resources is "res/" but this can be changed in the config file (generated whenever you run the project)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble or found a problem? Contact me at @0mpurdy or 0mpurdy@gmail.com and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
